text:
"Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay" is a 2008 American stoner comedy movie. It is the second movie in the "Harold & Kumar" series. It stars John Cho, Kal Penn, Paula Garcés, Neil Patrick Harris, Jon Reep, Rob Corddry and Ed Helms. It is directed/produced/written by Jon Hurwitz and Hayden Schlossberg. The movie was released on April 25, 2008 by Warner Bros. It received mixed reviews, but did well at the box office.
The movie follows the event after "Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle" with Harold and Kumar flying to Amsterdam in the Netherlands. They are then imprisoned and end up on a series of misadventures when they escape from Guantanamo Bay.

annotations.surface_form: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
